title: SQL Query Detector
description: Database security tools need to identify SELECT statements in SQL queries. These queries start with SELECT (case-insensitive) followed by a space and then field names or asterisk. Help identify potential data retrieval operations.
solutionSummary: Uses character alternatives [Ss][Ee][Ll][Ee][Cc][Tt] for case-insensitive SELECT, start anchor ^, \s+ for required whitespace, and .* for remaining query. Demonstrates case-insensitive matching without flags.
